mapper.select: select * from employee where name = #{name} and status = 1
mapper.sql: id, name, tel, birthday, status, remark, creator, create_time, operator, operate_time
mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, name, tel, birthday, status, remark, creator, create_time, operator, operate_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update employee
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update employee set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
